duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement medically prescribed Radiation Therapy treatment under supervision.
Deliver planned course of radiation therapy following appropriate guidelines.
Assure that Rx & Physics plan are signed by Physician prior to treatment.
Set up patient using triangulation methods & properly interpret physics plan.
Document all treatments rendered and maintain appropriate work records.
Identify patient teaching needs as part of the Radiation Therapy treatment course.
Perform all prescribed quality control checks on equipment, monitoring constantly for malfunctions.
Maintain all equipment used during treatments.
Participate in training and monitoring the performance of Radiation Therapy students during their clinical hours.

education_certification.credential: Graduate of an approved AMA program in Radiation Therapy required. ARRT certified and NYS License in Radiation Therapy Technology. Good communication skills.
